name: Where's My Pot?!
description:
"Where's My Pot?!" is an adventure of a leprechaun, often referred to as a lonely kind of fairy, who searches for his lost treasure.

This leprechaun can summon rainbows that will help him reach his goal, which has several threats, such as the need to overcome several kingdoms, commanded by different "monsters".

In this adventure, the leprechaun must use his rainbow to move between platforms, block projectiles, and protect himself from the traps present along the way. He must also make the most of the environment in which he finds himself, which can either strengthen him, in the case of the reflection of water, or harm him, in the case of the darkness of the castle.

Where's My Pot is a Platform Game developed by 6 students from FCUL (Diogo Rodrigues, Francisco Caldeira, José Mendes, Ricardo Coordeiro, João Loureiro e Ana Tam).
